reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 48/91: AGRICULTURAL INDUSTRY ADVISORY COMMITTEE
reg_info.act_under: Employment Standards Act   Loi sur les normes d’emploi

content.content: 1. (1) The Agricultural Industry Advisory Committee is established. O. Reg. 48/91, s. 1 (1). (2) The Committee may advise the Minister on matters related to the agricultural industry. O. Reg. 48/91, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The Agricultural Industry Advisory Committee is established. O. Reg. 48/91, s. 1 (1).

(2) The Committee may advise the Minister on matters related to the agricultural industry. O. Reg. 48/91, s. 1 (2).

content.content: 2. (1) The Committee shall be composed of six persons who shall be appointed by the Minister. O. Reg. 48/91, s. 2 (1). (2) A member of the Committee shall be designated as chair by the Minister. O. Reg. 48/91, s. 2 (2).
content.raw_html:
2. (1) The Committee shall be composed of six persons who shall be appointed by the Minister. O. Reg. 48/91, s. 2 (1).

(2) A member of the Committee shall be designated as chair by the Minister. O. Reg. 48/91, s. 2 (2).
